Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
src.services.AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
Manages bank accounts, including adding, retrieving, and saving accounts.

      public String getLatestAccountNumber()
      Gets the latest account number of the last added account.
      Returns:
      the latest account number, or null if no accounts exist

      Returns:
      a list of matching accounts

    • getAccountByNumber

      public Account getAccountByNumber(String accountNumber) throws InvalidAccountException
      Gets an account by account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number to search for
      Returns:
      the matching account
      Throws:
      InvalidAccountException - if no matching account is found
